headline: DevOps Engineer for Software Tools
description.text:
DevOps Engineer for Software Tools

The complexity of developing Electronic Control Units becomes manageable with the help of our software tools. We develop new and sophisticated functions for our design and configuration solutions. If you are enthusiastic about software development and DevOps, and you like to coordinate with colleagues in order to achieve the best overall solution, then this position is just right for you.

What you’ll do

You will be part of an agile team, implementing a reliable, high-performance and adaptable CI/CT/CD infrastructure for our Software Tools. Your tasks will include:

- Analysis of complex CI/CT/CD pipeline requirements and development of extensions for the continuous optimization of our CI/CD pipelines.

- Rollout of infrastructure changes, as well as support in the application of the infrastructure by the product development teams.

- Creation of tailor-made solutions in close coordination with the product development teams.

- Work towards meeting performance requirements.

You will be working with very competent co-workers in the Software Tools department located in Linköping and Germany.

About you

You have the ability to work & collaborate in a team environment and are not afraid of taking on new responsibilities within the team. A degree in computer science or equivalent experience is needed with knowledge of build and DevOps technologies such as Gradle Enterprise, Git, CheckMk, Jenkins, Docker and Kubernetes. As a person you are ambitious, self-driven and have good communication skills.

Following skills/experience is an advantage

- Experience in deploying, operating and monitoring distributed applications for the cloud, such as Microsoft Azure or Amazon AWS and the associated services.
- Practical experience in the field of infrastructure management and system architecture.

About Vector

We are a global, continuously growing engineering company. For over a quarter of a century, we have been at the forefront of electronic innovations within the automotive industry and related sectors. Vector has over 3,000 employees at 29 locations worldwide, supporting manufacturers and suppliers with a professional platform of software and hardware tools, embedded software components, and services for developing embedded systems. All with one mission: Simplifying the development of automotive electronics and software!

In Sweden we have a quickly growing Product Development Center of more than 60 engineers in Gothenburg and Linköping working close to our large development centers in Germany. To support the local customers, we have teams of around 25 product experts providing product deliveries and product support to customers in Scandinavia.

Why Vector Sweden?

We provide an attractive, high-tech working environment and our employees are at the heart of our success, using their creativity, passion, talent and skills. When we hear “This is impossible!” we put our heads together to make it possible. Our projects aren’t just about work. They are challenges that our employees strive to meet working together as a team. Every day we are working on emerging technologies of the future and our employees are the source of our innovative drive.

In Göteborg and Linköping you will have the atmosphere of a small company with the resources of a global organization. We have a work climate characterized by helpfulness and trust. You will always feel supported by your manager, team members and others within the company! At Vector Sweden we embrace diversity and are proud to have co-workers that are passionate about their work from all over the world! This makes us a productive workplace where we have fun together!

headline: DevOps Engineer to E-invoicing Platform
description.text:
The adoption of electronic invoicing is spreading at a rapid pace. Our customer provides world-leading SaaS based solutions for e-invoicing that contains features for digital signing, tax reporting and cloud-based archiving. The solutions smoothly integrate with commonly used ERP platforms and are used to enforce compliance with regulations in an international environment. These solutions are currently used by more than 7,000 corporations around the world.


We are now looking for a DevOps Engineer that will join their international development organization. They are currently in the interesting phase of building a completely new platform that will replace the different solutions that they have today. You will work in an agile and well-structured environment developing a modern and scalable software platform.


In this role as DevOps Engineer, you are focusing on automation of the software build, development and delivery process. You are focused on implementing good processes and tools for Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery.


We believe that you have the following qualifications:
- 3+ years of relevant working experience
- Solid experience in DevOps related tasks
- Experience in Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment
- Experience in TeamCity
- Good knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes
- Previous background in software development or TechOps is an advantage
- University level studies in computer science or similar
- Good English skills verbally and in writing


If you find our proposal interesting and you meet the above requirements for the position, please don't hesitate to apply.


All applications are treated strictly confidential. Applications will be handled as they are received.


About Jobshark:
Jobshark is offering recruiting services for the IT sector. We have about 200 customers and among them some of Sweden's most prominent technology companies. Jobshark is headquartered in Sweden and is part of a company group with about 50 employees.

headline: Cloud Engineer / DevOps developer
description.text:
We are seeking an ambitious and highly skilled Cloud engineer that will help maintaining and evolving our AWS deployed infrastructure.
About the company
DynamicSource develops advanced systems for airlines and the aviation industry.
Our software is found in the cockpit and operations offices of many major airlines worldwide.
Our knowledgeable staff consists of airline pilots, performance engineers, software developers and business developers. We are now looking for a new star in our team to help us fly higher.
Your Job 
 * Maintain, deploy and care for our infrastructure
 * Identify, evaluate and implement new technologies and solutions
 * Continuous performance tuning, optimization and improvements
Skills
 * Managing Infrastructure (IaC) with Terraform
 * Linux Administration
* Security focus, general IT security knowledge
 * Highly self-organised and disciplined / experience with remote work
Good to have!
Experience with...
 * AWS services EC2,RDS,ALB
 * Kubernetes
 * Ansible
 * node.js, Python, PHP, Bash, OOP
 * CDCI -- Jenkins
 * Interest in aviation (bonus point)
Working conditions 
The DynamicSource team is in the greater Stockholm area. Work from our central Stockholm office (5 min walk from Central Station) and/or remotely.
Next Steps 
Please email your cover letter (including your salary range expectations) and your CV in Swedish or English, with the subject: 'Cloud Engineer / DevOps developer' to recruitment@dynamicsource.se.
We will review applications continuously.

headline: DevOps Engineer, Infrastructure Services (Full-time)
description.text:
At Nexus, part of French IN Groupe, we secure the new society that emerges in the ever-expanding world of digital transformation. By challenging ourselves to go further and do better, we’re developing technology for high-demand global clients. Nexus’ Smart ID solutions and IoT platforms are changing how we perceive trusted identities. Do you want to be a part of our journey?  



https://se.linkedin.com/in/stefan-sk%C3%B6ld-31206b15), our Head of Infrastructure Services, is looking to strengthen the team with a talented DevOps Engineer to join our Stockholm office. Stefan is looking for someone who shares his pride in a stable, robust, and manageable IT infrastructure. You, who have been around and know the fundamentals of IT Ops and want to help us become even better in delivering XaaS solutions, scalable production environments and reliable core infrastructure.

What we offer you

- You will join a skilled and dedicated team, working closely with both products and customers. The solutions you build have a profound impact on millions of users each day.

- Stay relevant regarding security topics by joining an innovative identity and security company that secures society by enabling "Zero Trust" identities for people and things, in both the physical and digital world.

- Have the opportunity to collaborate and make a difference every day; we are small enough so every individual counts, and big enough for you to have work security and development opportunities.



What you’ll do at Nexus

As a DevOps Engineer, System Admin, IT Ops, or SRE (you can name it with many titles), you will take part in the day-to-day, running and maintaining the infrastructure that hosts production- and end-user platforms supporting critical applications.

Responsibilities include but are not limited to:

- Design, build, and maintain the core infrastructure used by all Nexus as a service offerings

- Troubleshoot issues across services and levels of the stack.

- Fine-tune monitoring (We use Datadog/OpsGenie).

- Plan for the growth of Nexus infrastructure.

- Ensure that the platforms always run at an up-to-date level.

- Work with customer tickets and act as 3rd line support to our technical support team.

On top of the day-to-day IT Ops work, there will always be other fun stuff to do, and depending on your own desires this could differ. This might include pen-testing, migration/transformation projects for customers, IT management tasks like incidents or changes, TSP management with CA ceremonies, deep-diving into automation etc.

Some of our Tech Stack: Terraform / Terragrunt, Kubernetes / Docker / Containers, Ansible, Azure / Azure DevOps, CentOS / RedHat / Rocky / Linux Datacenter operations, ITIL, Change management, Networking (Cisco) Firewalls (Clavister / Cisco) VMware, HSM (Hardware Security Modules) and more!



About you

- As a person you are a meticulous problem solver, focusing on details to enable robust and stable solutions. You like to work in a team but have no problem driving your own stories and projects.

- You’re persistent and if you see a problem you will point it out on every single stand-up until it’s taken care of.

- You are adaptable and not afraid of change.

- You work well with other people and relate to them in a responsive and smooth way. You understand the importance of listening, communicating, and resolving issues together in a constructive way.

- You enjoy being innovative, creative and active in your working set-up.



Qualifications

- You have a background and interest in IT Ops and Infrastructures. You think about systems, their edge cases, failure modes and lifecycles.

- You know your way around a CLI.

- You can troubleshoot complex problems across the whole stack.

- You know how to translate the business needs into workable tech/infrastructure by writing IaC.

- You understand the importance of holding yourself and others to a higher bar.

- Because this is a 24/7/365 environment we generally want everyone to take part in the on-call rotation every 6-8 weeks. If this is a big issue for you, let us know and we can discuss it.

-
You have a working proficiency level in English.



Not sure you meet 100% of the qualifications?

At Nexus, we understand that experience comes in many forms. We’re dedicated to adding new perspectives to the team - so if your experience is this close to what we’re looking for, please consider applying.

About your CV and the Process

You will not be asked to do a two-day assignment as a skill assessment, we do real-time tech interviews together with the team and we do not require you to apply with a resume/CV. Who has an updated resume anyway?

Transparency, security and trust are the core of our company; therefore, the final candidate will be subjected to a background check before employment.

Nexus is an equal opportunity employer. We truly believe in being ONE Nexus. You are welcomed at Nexus for who you are, no matter where you come from or what you look like. Our technology is for everyone, and so is our workplace. So, bring us your personal experience, your perspectives and your background to thrive, collaborate and be forward-thinking! It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep innovating the way we secure the world.

headline: DevOps Engineer till adesso Malmö
description.text:
Är du DevOps Engineer och trött på samma gamla samma?
Vi söker efter en hängiven problemlösare som älskar att automatisera bort allt tråkigt manuellt arbete. Om du är en mästare på att hantera Kubernetes och har erfarenhet av att arbeta med Azure så behöver vi dig omedelbums!
Som DevOps Engineer på adesso kommer du att arbeta mot en välkänd kund inom transport. Du kommer att ha möjlighet att arbeta med en mängd olika uppgifter för att säkerställa att vår kunds tjänster och applikationer är ständigt tillgängliga, säkra och skalbara. Du kommer att arbeta tätt med utvecklare och systemadministratörer för att skapa och underhålla automatiserade miljöer. Du vet, det där du brinner för på riktigt.
En viktig del i din roll kommer att vara incidenthantering där du kommer att ansvara för att hantera och lösa incidenter så snabbt det bara är möjligt för att minimera avbrott i tjänsterna. Du kommer också att arbeta med underhåll och uppdatering av Kubernetes-plattformen samt kontrollera konfigurationer för att säkerställa att kraven och standarder följs.
Vi ser gärna att du: 
- Har 5+ års erfarenhet som DevOps Engineer
- Har erfarenhet av att bygga och underhålla automatiserade miljöer med Terraform
- Har erfarenhet inom Azure eller andra molntjänster som AWS eller GCP
- Har hög kunskap inom Kubernetes och/eller andra container-tekniker
- Är flytande i svenska i tal och skrift
Hos oss får du chansen att jobba på en fantastisk och flexibel arbetsplats där vi satsar på våra anställda och ger dig möjligheten att bredda ditt CV och utveckla dina kunskaper ytterligare. Så vad väntar du på? In med din ansökan bara så hörs vi.

headline: DevOps Engineer for Inify Laboratories👨‍🔬
description.text:
Inify Laboratories provides cancer diagnostics through ultramodern laboratory services within pathology. It uses a fully digital, standardized and AI-supported workflow to optimize quality and response times, initially within prostate.
We are now looking for a DevOps Engineer to join their team!
Job Summary

As a DevOps Engineer, you will optimize tools and methods in the process from machine learning research, through design, implementation, integration, test, deployment, and operations of information systems. At one end of the process, you will be working with management and processing of training data for machine learning. At the other end you will be selecting operations platforms, ensuring effective operations, and establishing mechanisms for operations monitoring and user feedback.

As most of the team is located in Linköping, this will be the preferred location for new team members, but Stockholm is also possible for those prepared to travel to Linköping on a regular basis. Aside from some in-person meetings in the Linköping office, they offer a choice between working in the office or remotely.

This is a 6-month consulting assignment where you will be employed through us at Wrknest and work at Inify Laboratories. You have a good chance of being employed by Inify Laboratories after the consulting assignment. If it suits you better with a direct recruitment to Inify Laboratories that option is available, with a probationary employment of 6 months.

Job Description
- Continually, together with the process owners, optimize the DevOps process.
- Build and acquire tools for automating, accelerating, and monitoring the DevOps process.
- Support all roles in the DevOps process with expertise, methods, and tools.
- Define operations models for information systems (on-premises, cloud).
- Evaluate and propose suppliers for information systems operations.



Key Qualifications
- You speak and write English fluently, skills in Swedish are a plus
- Knowledge of all steps in the DevOps process (machine learning, development, integration, verification, deployment, operations, server administration, backup, monitoring, and user feedback)
- Understanding of on-premises and cloud operations models and their tradeoffs
- Knowledge of cybersecurity
- Good programming skills in Python
- Understanding of GPU clusters for machine learning would be beneficial



Tech stack
The currently used technologies are:

- GitLab (Git, CI/CD, Issues, ...)

- Python

- Ubuntu/Linux

- Docker

- Ansible

- IPv4 Networking

- Proxmox.

Understanding of HTML and JavaScript would be beneficial.

What Inify Laboratories offers
- The chance to make a real difference in cancer care.
- Interesting problems that nobody has solved before.
- Great learning opportunities.
- Opportunities to publish research.
- Brilliant and friendly colleagues.
- An enlightened and rational culture.
- Flexible working arrangements.


Additional information

Start: Immediately with regard to any notice period
Place: Linköping/Stockholm
Form of employment: Full-time 40h/week

Please apply as soon as possible as we work with ongoing selection.

 For these positions, you need to live in Sweden and have a Swedish work permit.

https://www.inify.com/)

Inify Laboratories (https://www.inify.com/)

Inify Laboratories is building its first histopathology laboratory in Stockholm, Sweden. Our pathologists and personnel will be supported by state-of-the-art information systems, such as a proprietary AI-based pathology decision support tool, the Inify pathology workstation with structured reporting, and a tailor-made laboratory process support system. The R&D team of Inify Laboratories will continually improve the digital tools using an agile devops process. Together with the medical and laboratory staff, as well as external partners, they will also participate in research activities to further the state of the art of digital pathology.

headline: Junior DevOps Engineer to Telia
description.text:
Are you a team player with a big interest in IT, who wants the opportunity to further develop your career at one of Sweden's largest IT companies? Do you want to be part of Telia's team that gives you a varied and developing workplace where you get to work with Telia's strategic IT applications to support the company's business? Are you ready to take the next step in your IT career? Apply today!  

OM TJÄNSTEN 
On behalf of Telia, Academic Work is looking for their next Dev-Ops Engineer in Service Order Management and Activation.

This is a consulting assignment. You will be employed by Academic Work and work as a consultant at Telia. The assignment will be full-time. There are good opportunities to be over-recruited, given that all parties are satisfied with the cooperation.

ARBETSUPPGIFTER 
In this position, you will be part of the SOM and Activation team working in an Agile way, following the Agile Release Train processes. You will be working within a wide range of diverse technologies stretching form databases, networking, servers, clusters and other components and services. The team is also in the middle of the Cloud Native transformation, introducing products running in K8s.

Typical daily tasks will involve participation in system design, environment setup, proactive and continuous service improvements, but it can also include incident management, life cycle management, installations/patching and problem resolution.

Further job duties include:


* Troubleshooting and resolving issues in development, test and production environments
* Application deployments and configuration changes to support new releases
* Analyzing system/processes and initiating necessary improvements and changes
* Incident & Problem management with a proactive/preventative approach, ticket handling
* Taking on the technical role as the DevOps engineer in ARTs and also being able to run smaller tasks
* Developing tools to support our systems
* Automation improvements
* GRC (Governance, risk, and compliance) controls execution
* Knowledge base maintenance
* Collaborating with other teams and solving complex issues


VI SÖKER DIG SOM 
- A candidate with a BSc or MSc towards the IT area or a Vocational Degree towards Dev-Ops specifically (minimum 2 years)
- A candidate with fluency in English in both speaking and writing
- Great skills in Linux

Merituous:


* A candidate with previous experience in a Dev-Ops position


As a person, you have good communication skills & enjoy collaboration with others. You are self-organized and structured. You are also adaptive, persistent, and willing to take initiatives.

In order to be eligible for the role, you will undergo a security check by Telia. To pass the security clearance, you must also have been a resident in Sweden during the last 3 years.

Other information:


* Start: As soon as possible
* Work extent: Consultant assignment fulltime, long term
* Location: Solna, Stockholm


This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.

Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the screening or interview phase.

INFORMATION OM FÖRETAGET 
Telia Company AB is a Swedish multinational telecommunications company and mobile network operator present in Sweden, Finland, Norway, Denmark, Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia.

headline: Continuous Delivery and DevOps Consultant
description.text:
Continuous Delivery and DevOps Consultant
Consulting - Stockholm
Would you like to join the Nordic leaders within Continuous Delivery and DevOps?


We are looking for a person with a growth mindset and a passion for development, who wants to be a part of our team of expert consultants. 
We act as a strategic partner to our clients where we assess their needs and deploy consultants that can make a strategic impact. Our success lies is having a strong-knitted and diverse team, characterized by technical excellence, quality of work and an environment where we share our skills and expertise.


As a Continuous Delivery and DevOps Consultant you will be making sure organizations become more efficient in their software development and delivery process. You will be leading with example and keeping up-to-date while writing code. Moreover, you will design and improve software development using Continuous Delivery, Lean, Agile and DevOps ways of working.


To succeed in this position, you need: 
Minimum of 3 years of industry experience within software development or operations
Knowledge of a contemporary programming language (such as Java, C#, Python or Go)
knowledge of a scripting language (such as Bash, Groovy, Python, or Ruby)
knowledge of infrastructure automation tools (such as Terraform, Ansible or SaltStack)
knowledge of a major build tool (such as Maven, NPM, Gradle or Make)
Experience with monitoring tools, logging infrastructure and tracing frameworks
Experience with container technologies (such as Docker, Kubernetes or Mesos)
A solid understanding of Lean and Agile software development methodologies
Professional working proficiency in English



It would also be a plus if you have experience: 
Working as a consultant
Coaching and leading people
Implementing Continuous Delivery and/or DevOps
With any of the major cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google Cloud Platform)
With Extreme Programming (XP)
With Linux system administration 



In both 2017 and 2018, Diabol was recognized as a “Gasell Company” by Dagens Industri, due to our fast growth and strong financials over the previous four years. This is your opportunity to join one of Stockholm's most exciting consultancies! 
Öppen för alla
Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.

headline: DevOps Developer - Public Safety
description.text:
Hur skulle det kännas att veta att ditt arbete bidrog till att rädda livet på personen som den passerande ambulansen precis hämtat upp? Om det ger dig gåshud borde du absolut jobba som DevOps utvecklare här på CSAM Public Safety i Göteborg!

Som vår DevOps utvecklare kommer du att bli en del av ett större team med både utvecklare och testare som arbetar passionerat och innovativt. Tillsammans kommer ni att leverera de allra bästa lösningarna på effektivaste sätt för blåljusmyndigheter. Du kommer också vara en del av en intressant, rolig och lärande miljö där vi hjälps åt och arbetar naturligt med kunskapsdelning och har roligt medan vi jobbar.

Som vår DevOps utvecklare kommer du:

Utveckla och underhålla vår utvecklingsmiljö och infrastruktur för att jobba så effektivt och sömlöst som möjligt.

Automatisera allt från GIT, byggen och releasepipelines till enhets- och funktionstest.

Vara en del av resan med arkitekturlyft, leverera via containers och flytta våra lösningar till cloud.

Samarbeta med alla våra utvecklingsteam och driva att vårt devops arbete utförs enligt best practice.

Dina matchande styrkor för denna roll är:

- Högskoleexamen inom mjukvaruutveckling eller motsvarande

- Minst 3 års erfarenhet av en liknande roll

- Git

- CI/CD

- .NET

- Azure DevOps Server eller motsvarande DevOps miljöer, tex Jenkins

- Micro Services / Containers

- Passion för DevOps

- En nyfikenhet att ständigt utveckla dina kunskaper

- Team player med stark can-do attityd

- Flytande svenska och engelska

Det är meriterande om du också har erfarenhet av:

- Windows-miljö; Visual Studio, C#/.NET, AD-struktur

- SQL - Sql Server

- ELK, Grafana och Prometheus

- Cloud-baserade tekniker så som tex leverera och drifta i cloud

- Orkestrering och klusterhantering

Lär känna oss:

Idag är vi i CSAM Health koncernen en ledande leverantör av specialistlösningar i Norden, Europa och utanför, med huvudkontor i Oslo, och kontor i 10 länder i Europa, Asien och Nordamerika. Våra begåvade, multikulturella team levererar idag lösningar som möjliggör att sjukhus, hälsovårdsleverantörer och räddningspersonal får tillgång till kritisk information på plats och kan ge bästa kvalitet på vård till kunder i 25 länder.

Inom affärsområdet CSAM Public Safety arbetar ungefär 65 personer och vi utvecklar produkter och lösningar för blåljusmyndigheter. Majoriteten är lokaliserade på vårt nyrenoverade kontor i centrala Göteborg, men vi har också kontor i Karlstad, Oslo och Valencia, Spanien.

Vi intervjuar kontinuerligt, vi rekommenderar därför att du skickar in din ansökan så snart som möjjligt.

Vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!

headline: DevOps Engineer for Tavana Tech
description.text:
Tavana Tech is growing, and we are now looking for a DevOps Engineer for our exciting customers. Would you like to be a part of our development teams, consisting of a highly inclusive mix of skilled Frontend-and Backend developer, DevOps Engineers, iOS/Android developers and Cloud Architects from all over the world? Also, get the opportunity to be led by our dedicated management team who will guide you forward in your career?

 5+ years experience of software development

 Work experience with Docker/Kubernetes

Meritorious if you have experience/knowledge within:

We offer:

Every employee is equally important to our company growth and success, and therefore we value individual feedback and work actively with personal development.

Sounds interesting?

We look forward to receiving your application

headline: DevOps Lead till techbolag i expansionsfas
description.text:
Inbiten DevOps-fantast med stenkoll på molnplattformar och infrastruktur som önskar nå sin fulla potential på modernt techbolag. Här blir du del av en grupp erfarna och nytänkande individer som använder sin kompetens och kärlek för modern teknik till att främja entreprenörskap och nyföretagande.
Yoin Technologies är ett ungt och modernt techbolag som består av ett litet men sammansvetsat gäng med en mängd olika erfarenheter och kompetenser. Här får du chansen att briljera med din egen kunskap och samtidigt växa genom andras. Nu söker man en individ med mångårig erfarenhet inom infrastruktur och DevOps med fokus på molntjänster som vill vara en ledande stjärnan i Yoins DevOps team.
Som DevOps Lead får du möjligheten att vara den ledande profilen på bolaget inom DevOps och blir en betydande del i Yoins satsning framåt genom att tillsammans med övriga områdesansvariga inom Development och Test bygga upp ett starkt och kompetent team för att kunna möta kunders behov på bästa sätt. Du kommer spendera en hel del tid med att vara ute hos kund men också med att bygga upp verksamheten inom ditt område.
--- 
Gå in direkt och gör en anonym lönematchning: https://jobnet.se/devops-lead-yoin?utm_source=arbetsformedlingen&utm_medium=annons&utm_content=yoin-technologies&utm_term=devops-lead
---
Rekryteringen sker via Jobnet.se där du även hittar bilder, videos och mer information om tjänsten och företaget.

headline: DevOps Engineer for building CI/CD pipelines
description.text:
Our offer

As a consultant at Capgemini Engineering, you are part of something bigger. In multidisciplinary teams you make your contribution to the most innovative products in the rapidly transforming automotive industry. 

All our projects, whether in-house or at our leading customers, are part of our ambition of making life more advanced, more sustainable and easier. Capgemini Engineering offers you a work environment branded by ambition and care. You will be working with cutting edge technology, developing yourself surrounded by dedicated colleagues with high expertise.

Your role
The skills and proficiencies required to fill up this role are: 

 - Proficient in at least one of the scripting languages like Python, Shell, Groovy etc.
 - Expertise in using DevOps tools like Git and GitHub, Jenkins for building CI/CD pipelines
 - Good to have strong testing skills 
 - Experience of working with tools like artifactory (JFrog), Dockor and Message Bus
 - Proficient in cloud platform tools like Amazon web services or Azure
 - Software development methodologies
 - Software architecture.

Proactively drive initiatives to improve project delivery e.g., improve code quality, suggest changes to ways-of-working and more. Proven success in a team orientated environment and use of agile methods. 

It is important that you want to work with the latest technologies and have a drive to make a difference with a strong delivery mindset. 
Your profile
Bachelor, Masters, or Civil Engineering degree
5 years of DevOps engineering experience.
Fluency in both Swedish and English.
Good communication and interpersonal skills. 

Application and contact
Selection and interviews are running continuously.
Apply now since we assign roles during the whole application time span.
For questions and for more information contact Jan Hansson, Talent Acquisition Partner, 0725-616900 

We kindly but firmly refrain from direct contact with staffing, brokerage, and recruitment companies as well as other external actors and sellers of additional job advertisements. 

Capgemini Engineering is an integral part of the Capgemini Group, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided every day by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of 270,000 team members in nearly 50 countries. With its strong 50-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2020 global revenues of €16 billion.

Get the Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

headline: Finansinspektionen | helhetsansvar som DevOps Lead
description.text:
Är du systemutvecklare eller mjukvaruarkitekt med DevOps-inriktning och redo för en spännande tjänst där du får ta ansvar som DevOps-lead? Vill du arbeta med Azure DevOps för en samhällsbärande, samt växande organisation med ett allt större uppdrag? Vill du arbeta centralt i Stockholm, ha goda förmåner och en god anställningstrygghet?

Om rollen som DevOps-lead

Vi söker nu en erfaren systemutvecklare eller mjukvaruarkitekt med inriktning DevOps som vill ta ett helhetsansvar för vår övergripande systemutvecklingsprocess, gemensamma verktyg/plattformar inom it-utveckling och Azure DevOps. Rollen innebär att agera produktägare för DevOps-teamet och leda arbetet inom DevOps/DevSecOps på FI, det vill säga att vara ett aktivt och operativt stöd till utvecklingsteam och systemutvecklare för att uppnå en optimal kombination av processer, mjukvaruarkitektur och verktyg som stöd för att alla utvecklare ska lyckas leverera effektivt samt med säkerhet och kvalitet.

I denna roll som DevOps-lead agerar du såväl strategiskt, koordinerande som operativt där du, och resten av DevOps-teamet, har möjlighet att hjälpa teamen praktiskt. Centralt i rollen är att utveckla hur vi arbetar med exempelvis Continuous Delivery, säker utveckling, Azure DevOps, mjukvaruarkitektur, testautomatisering samt att säkra operativt genomförande av detta genom våra team.
 
 En aktiv omvärldsbevakning av it-utvecklingsfrågor är en naturlig del av ditt arbete för att säkra att vi arbetar modernt och använder oss av relevanta verktyg och tekniker.
 
 Din utbildning och erfarenhet

Vi söker dig som

 * har akademisk utbildning inom it eller motsvarande kunskaper förvärvade på annat sätt
 * har flera års erfarenhet av att arbeta med systemutveckling eller mjukvaruarkitektur
 * har erfarenhet av systemutveckling i C#/.NET och/eller erfarenhet av Azure DevOps eller liknande plattform
 * har grundläggande erfarenhet inom databaser och SQL
 * har erfarenhet av agilt arbete
 * uttrycker dig väl på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.

Det är meriterande om du 

 * har examen som civilingenjör, inom systemvetenskap eller liknande
 * har erfarenhet av att definiera systemutvecklingsprocesser och arbeta med säker utveckling
 * har erfarenhet av såväl egenutvecklade system som standardsystem
 * har kunskaper om integration, API, BI och dataanalys
 * har erfarenhet som produktägare eller liknande roll
 * har erfarenhet av utveckling av kontinuerlig leverans (Continuous Delivery) pipelines
 * har erfarenhet från finansbranschen och/eller offentlig sektor.

Om dig

I rollen som erfaren systemutvecklare med helhetsansvar som DevOps-lead behöver du

 * bidra till ett gott samarbete
 * driva ditt arbete framåt inom ditt ansvarsområde
 * kommunicera tydligt med olika målgrupper
 * agera och ta beslut när det behövs.

Om Finansinspektionen

FI bidrar till ett stabilt finansiellt system, en hållbar utveckling och ett högt skydd för konsumenter. Vi erbjuder dig att arbeta med samhällsviktiga uppgifter, där du är med och påverkar den finansiella marknaden.

På FI arbetar cirka 600 personer och våra värderingar präglas av att vi är engagerade, beslutsamma, målinriktade och hjälpsamma. Vår arbetsplats ligger centralt i Stockholm. Det finns även möjlighet att delvis arbeta på distans.

Verksamhetsområde It leder det strategiska digitaliseringsarbetet, driver innovation och ansvarar för internationell koordinering inom it. Vårt uppdrag är brett och vårt ansvarsområde sträcker sig från löpande drift, support och säkerhet till utveckling och förvaltning av våra system, projektledning, arkitektur, upphandlingar samt leverantörsstyrning. Här jobbar cirka 100 personer, fördelade på sex avdelningar och en stab.

Bra att veta

Vi baserar vår rekrytering på kompetens. Det innebär att vi noggrant definierar vilka kvalifikationer som efterfrågas och sedan utgår från dem genom hela rekryteringsprocessen.
 
 Vi arbetar aktivt för mångfald och likabehandling och välkomnar därför medarbetare med olika erfarenheter, bakgrunder och kompetenser.
 
 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
 
 Arbetspsykologiska tester ingår i rekryteringsprocessen.
 
 På FI arbetar vi aktivt för att vara en attraktiv arbetsgivare där du som medarbetare trivs och utvecklas. Läs mer om hur det är att jobba på FI och vad vi erbjuder: https://www.fi.se/sv/om-fi/lediga-jobb/vi-erbjuder/

En anställning på FI kan innebära att säkerhetsprövning och registerkontroll görs enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen.

Sök jobbet
 
 Välkommen med din ansökan som ska innehålla cv, personligt brev och relevanta intyg eller examensbevis.
 
 Vi avböjer all hjälp med rekrytering och annonsering.

Anställningsform:

Anställningen är tillsvidare och inleds med sex månaders provanställning. Tillträde enligt överenskommelse.

Omfattning:

Heltid

Kontaktperson:

För information om rekryteringsprocessen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Johan Saginer Eriksson via johan.saginer.eriksson@se.experis.com eller på 072 301 48 26.

För mer information om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta avdelningschef Peter Arvidsson, 08-408 980 59.

Sista ansökningsdag:

2023-03-27

SÖK GÄRNA TJÄNSTEN VIA DENNA LÄNK!!
https://www.fi.se/sv/om-fi/lediga-jobb/lediga-jobb/?rmpage=job&rmjob=1864&rmlang=SE

headline: Senior Software Developer in DevOps (716895)
description.text:
Do you as a developer want to work in the middle of everything? Then apply for a position in CAT team!
 
We are looking for an agile developer with a genuine interest in technology, programming, and scripting to strengthen the Continuous Automation Team (CAT)
CAT is responsible for the continuous integration and automation incl tools within BOS organization. The services are utilized by several organizations across multiple sites.
As a successful candidate you will work within this agile team, interacting with several of our software development teams within the BOS portfolio, to realize improvements and maintain the Continuous Automation environment, incl tools.
 
The main responsibility for the CAT-team is to provide and maintain automated test and development environments, both in software development pipelines and virtualized environments. The CI/CD environments are used by the BOS products in the daily work from development to customer delivery.
This is done by e.g improving the user environment, providing the necessary tools for the developer, shortening our Continuous Integration lead time via automated jobs to ensure fast feedback loops in general and being the interface towards the IT and test environment organization.
 
What you will do
Work with continues improvements and drive towards modern technologies
Develop tools and services
Perform trouble shooting and customer support
Be a part of an impactful team that can make a change in the organization

 
You will bring
A university degree (MSc or BSc) in Software Engineering, Computer Science or similar
At least 5 years of experience in product development
Excellent skills in communication, both verbal and written
Very good skills in software development
Deep skills in programming in general. Meriting Python, JavaScript, Groovy
Deep experience of Linux systems
Experience in general tools and techniques: e.g. Docker, GIT, Jenkins, Maven, Mesos, MongoDB, MySQL, Gerrit, Kubernetes
A team spirit

 
Meritorious qualifications:
Troubleshooting skills – which in its turn require to have hands on experience of signaling and platform (HW, Hypervisor, OS, 3PPs and APIs)
Good understanding of infrastructure, networking and IP in general
Experience of Service Oriented Architecture (SOA, web services, REST)
Experience of agile development

 
Why join Ericsson?
At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity! The chance to use your skills and creativity to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
 
What happens once you apply?
Visit https://www.ericsson.com/en/careers/hiring-process to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
 
Application:
We look forward to receiving your application in English. Please note we cannot accept applications via email.
 
Please send in your application in English as soon as possible since the process is ongoing
 
Primary location for this role: Karlskrona, Sweden
For specific questions please contact Recruiter: Monika Jasinska monika.jasinska@ericsson.com
 
 
We welcome the opportunity to meet you!
 
Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we nurture it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team.
Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer, learn more at https://www.ericsson.com/en/careers.
Primary country and city: Sweden (SE) || Sweden : Blekinge : Karlskrona 
Req ID: 716895

headline: Humble DevOps Engineer with Python skills
description.text:
About the opportunity:

We are looking for an experienced DevOps Engineer that has worked with Linux based embedded systems. You will get the opportunity to join an innovative company within the telecommunications service provider market with a highly-skilled R&D organization.

Your profile should include the following:

- Experience (5 years) within SW development/test in embedded systems
- You love Python development
- Experience in CI/CD using Jenkins (Groovy and pure Bash)
- Yocto or Buildroot for building an embedded Linux distro
- Daily usage of Git
- Fluent in English

About Insert Talent

At Insert Talent, we put your interest and career first. We have a transparent set-up where you are first permanently employed by Insert Talent as a consultant, usually 6-12 months. After that period you will have the option to join our client company as a permanent employee.

Please note that it is an option, meaning it's up to you and the client to find an agreement after the initial consultancy period. We are always transparent regarding salary expectations and benefits, which simplifies reaching an agreement with the client company.

If you decide not to join the client company for some reason, it is our responsibility to find you a new assignment that is a better match. Our success rate at finding a great match is very high, and it is our goal that you become permanently employed by our client company.

The model is appreciated both by our candidates and our clients.

Follow our open-source work at www.gorillabanana.com (https://www.gorillabanana.com/) (https://www.gorillabanana.com/)

headline: Configuration manager med kunskap inom DevOps
description.text:
Semcon är företaget för dig som vill arbeta i trygg miljö och samtidigt bli utmanad. Hos oss får du möjlighet att lära dig många saker på kort tid både i dina omväxlande uppdrag och genom att kommunicera med dina kollegor på Semcon. I Jönköping är vi ett tjugotal kollegor som är experter inom bl.a. konstruktion, produktutveckling och projektledning. Vi letar nu efter dig som vill komplettera vårt starka team men din kunskap som Configuration Manager.

I rollen som Configuration Manager blir du en del av gruppen som har ansvar för att ta fram planer och vidareutveckla processer gällande konfigurationen, samt se till att dessa följs upp och dokumenteras. Du agerar support till utvecklarna vid frågor gällande t ex källkodshantering, kravhantering, installationer, ärendehantering och liknande. Rollen innebär också ansvar för CM-dokumentation vid release av mjukvara och du kommer också ge support organisationen gällande övrig dokumentation.

För att lyckas och må bra i tjänsten tror vi att du har en högskoleutbildning med inriktning systemutveckling eller liknande samt erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, kontinuerlig integration, kontinuerlig leverans och skriptning i Azure DevOps. Som person är du kommunikativ och mycket bra på att samarbeta samt trivs i en miljö där du får arbeta proaktivt och förebyggande.

På Semcon ser vi det som en självklarhet att arbeta för allas välmående. Vi gör det genom att erbjuda trygghetsskapande kollektivavtal, friskvårdsbidrag, tre flexibla lediga dagar samt en härlig sammanhållning. Vår önskan är också att skapa en heterogen arbetsplats där olika perspektiv kan tas tillvara och där vi på så vis kan få en härlig arbetsplats och konsulter som kan leverera det bästa till våra kunder.

Då många av våra uppdrag finns inom försvarsindustrin, så ser vi gärna sökande som klarar den säkerhetsprövning som krävs för att kunna utföra uppdragen. Uppdragen kan även medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.

Välkommen med din ansökan till tjänsten som Configuration Manager i Jönköping. Om du har frågor är du välkommen att vända dig till Area Manager Risto Kesti (risto.kesti@semcon.com) eller rekryterare Anna Henebäck (anna.heneback@semcon.com).

headline: DevOps Engineer till Ticket i Göteborg
description.text:
Var experten som är ansvarig för att utvecklingen går smidigt? Sök tjänsten som DevOps Engineer hos Ticket i Göteborg

För oss på Ticket är det viktigt att ha roligt på jobbet! Här arbetar vi för att utvecklas och bli bättre på det vi gör. Vi tror på att våra medarbetare har bäst koll på hur de vill arbeta, där vår kultur präglas av både frihet och inkludering. Här blir du del av en familjär privatresebyrå med korta beslutsvägar som satsar mycket på sin tekniska miljö. Vi försöker alltid att låta medarbetarna tillsammans välja teknik, där vår tech-stack idag bland annat innehåller: k8s, microtjänster, AWS, EKS, Prometheus, gitops, JX3, Tekton, Terraform, Java, Python och Go. 

Vi erbjuder dig

 • Stort utrymme att sätta din prägel på rollen, tekniken och utvecklingen
 • Arbeta med moderna tekniker inom en organisation som satsar mycket på digital utveckling och innovation
 • Fina förmåner, bland annat generösa reseförmåner

Det här gör du hos oss

Som DevOps Engineer hos oss på Ticket är du experten på DevOps. Du kommer bland annat vara delaktig i funktionella diskussioner och hjälpa utvecklare med kompetens inom AWS, Kubernetes och pipelines samt:

 • Arbeta med open source och drifta molnplattformen (AWS)
 • Skapa funktioner för att skapa en enkel och effektiv miljö för utvecklarna
 • Vara med i hela processen från att skapa en story till att produktionssätta den

Ditt team och arbetsplats

På Ticket är vi i dagsläget runt 40 utvecklare som i sin tur är fördelade i mindre produktteam. De agila teamen är autonoma och väljer självständigt teknikval och andra viktiga beslut.

I den här rollen arbetar du i Core-teamet, ett mindre team som ansvarar för utvecklarnas effektivitet. Teamet präglas av organisationens kultur där initiativ uppmuntras och teamet tar ansvar för det de bygger. Vi ser gärna att gruppen är några dagar på kontoret för sammanhållningen, men teamen styr vilka dagar det blir. I den här rollen är vi öppna för att du sitter i Stockholm eller Göteborg.

Mer om dig

För att trivas i den här rollen ser vi att du har god erfarenhet av DevOps, kubernetes och AWS eller annan molntjänst. Vi ser även att du har bred erfarenhet av techspråk och miljöer.

Vi ser det som positivt om du har bakgrund inom utveckling med Java eller annan kod. Som person ser vi att du är driven och initiativtagande och tar ansvar för det du bygger. Vi ser även att du är kommunikativ och gillar att samarbeta samt dela med dig av din kunskap.

Så här får vi kontakt
I den här rekryteringen har vi valt att samarbeta med Ada Digital som strävar efter en transparent, inkluderande och snabbrörlig rekryteringsupplevelse. Vi vill veta mer om dig och din potential! Du söker tjänsten enkelt och behöver inte bifoga några dokument. Det räcker med en motivering till varför du söker tjänsten och om du saknar CV kan du bifoga din LinkedIn-profil. Följ sedan din ansökan live via vår hemsida. Urvalet sker löpande och tjänsten kan bli tillsatt före sista ansökningsdatum. Är du nyfiken och vill veta mer innan du söker? Hör av dig till ansvarig rekryterare. Vi ser fram emot att få kontakt med dig!

headline: DevOps Engineer till Ticket i Stockholm
description.text:
I rollen som DevOps Engineer på Ticket i Stockholm leder du deras DevOps arbete som underlättar för över 40 utvecklare! 

För oss på Ticket är det viktigt att ha roligt på jobbet! Här arbetar vi för att utvecklas och bli bättre på det vi gör. Vi tror på att våra medarbetare har bäst koll på hur de vill arbeta, där vår kultur präglas av både frihet och inkludering. Här blir du del av en familjär privatresebyrå med korta beslutsvägar som satsar mycket på sin tekniska miljö. Vi försöker alltid att låta medarbetarna tillsammans välja teknik, där vår tech-stack idag bland annat innehåller: k8s, microtjänster, AWS, EKS, Prometheus, gitops, JX3, Tekton, Terraform, Java, Python och Go. 

Vi erbjuder dig

 • Stort utrymme att sätta din prägel på rollen, tekniken och utvecklingen
 • Arbeta med moderna tekniker inom en organisation som satsar mycket på digital utveckling och innovation
 • Fina förmåner, bland annat generösa reseförmåner

Det här gör du hos oss

Som DevOps Engineer hos oss på Ticket är du experten på DevOps. Du kommer bland annat vara delaktig i funktionella diskussioner och hjälpa utvecklare med kompetens inom AWS, Kubernetes och pipelines samt:

 • Arbeta med open source och drifta molnplattformen (AWS)
 • Skapa funktioner för att skapa en enkel och effektiv miljö för utvecklarna
 • Vara med i hela processen från att skapa en story till att produktionssätta den

Ditt team och arbetsplats

På Ticket är vi i dagsläget runt 40 utvecklare som i sin tur är fördelade i mindre produktteam. De agila teamen är autonoma och väljer självständigt teknikval och andra viktiga beslut.

I den här rollen arbetar du i Core-teamet, ett mindre team som ansvarar för utvecklarnas effektivitet. Teamet präglas av organisationens kultur där initiativ uppmuntras och teamet tar ansvar för det de bygger. Vi ser gärna att gruppen är några dagar på kontoret för sammanhållningen, men teamen styr vilka dagar det blir. I den här rollen är vi öppna för att du sitter i Stockholm eller Göteborg.

Mer om dig

För att trivas i den här rollen ser vi att du har god erfarenhet av DevOps, kubernetes och AWS eller annan molntjänst. Vi ser även att du har bred erfarenhet av techspråk och miljöer. Vi ser det som positivt om du har bakgrund inom utveckling med Java eller annan kod. Som person ser vi att du är driven och initiativtagande och tar ansvar för det du bygger. Vi ser även att du är kommunikativ och gillar att samarbeta samt dela med dig av din kunskap.

Så här får vi kontakt
I den här rekryteringen har vi valt att samarbeta med Ada Digital som strävar efter en transparent, inkluderande och snabbrörlig rekryteringsupplevelse. Vi vill veta mer om dig och din potential! Du söker tjänsten enkelt och behöver inte bifoga några dokument. Det räcker med en motivering till varför du söker tjänsten och om du saknar CV kan du bifoga din LinkedIn-profil. Följ sedan din ansökan live via vår hemsida. Urvalet sker löpande och tjänsten kan bli tillsatt före sista ansökningsdatum. Är du nyfiken och vill veta mer innan du söker? Hör av dig till ansvarig rekryterare. Vi ser fram emot att få kontakt med dig!

headline: Senior DevOps Engineer - Toca Days
description.text:
Toca Days is our most ambitious project yet - a friendly multiplayer world for children celebrating the excitement and quirkiness of everyday life. A 3D world where kids can play and explore in real time through their own avatar.

We’re in the process of consolidating our cloud tech into one cloud provider. To do this we need an experienced DevOps Engineer with focus on AWS, infrastructure, and automation, with deep knowledge of cloud platforms, service and solid engineering practices to allow us to fully utilize the platform. 

You’d be working in Toca Days while closely collaborating with Central Tech that is responsible for the tech stack as a platform. You’d be in a position to set best practices, and have ideas and opinions about how we improve both efficiency and quality. 

What you’ll be doing

In this role you’re involved in the full product cycle for services, infrastructures and automation in the Toca Days project, from green field development to maintaining the scalability and performance with millions of users.

You’ll lead the creation of processes that serve developers with a fast, consistent and easy way to integrate and deploy services and game builds and with that let game team developers focus on building the best possible game. 

You will be creating processes and tools and introducing best practices for things like AWS usage, monitoring, cloud strategy and handling security for backend services. Together with the rest of the team, you’ll define and set up common levels of monitoring of backend services.

You’ll be the one leading the work with our existing cloud infrastructure, and will support and coach the other developers in the usage of AWS and tools within infrastructure, ensuring sustainable development processes and workflows.
Is this you?

You have solid professional experience with AWS at scale, preferably for non-web consumers (apps, other services, apis etc). Along with that, you have experience building and deploying services in the cloud, and living in an Infrastructure as Code environment. 

You have knowledge about containerization (i.e. Docker), Kubernetes and IaC (Terraform and/or CloudFormation), and a good understanding of databases preferably both relational and nosql databases. 

With excellent communication skills, you’re able to merge non-technical requirements into a technical solution

If you have knowledge about the Unity build pipeline and assets packaging pipelines, that’s a plus.

This is us!

Toca Boca captures the spirit of play. We create digital toys and everyday products that are filled with fun and silliness that kids from any corner of the world can instantly relate to. Everything is designed from their perspective. We celebrate the diversity and quirkiness of their world and give them the freedom to play in ways that only they can.

Good to know!

This position is full time and based in our Stockholm studio with a hybrid working model (part office, part working from home). We apply a 6-month probationary period. You’ll need to be located in Sweden as we are unable to support with relocation. As we’re an international company, with over 20 nationalities working here, and millions of users all over the world, you need to be fluent in English. Your application should therefore be in English. 

Come join us - it'll be fun!

Toca Boca develops digital games that capture the power of play and that are filled with fun and silliness that kids around the world can instantly relate to. Since our first product launch in 2011, we have released 46 apps that have been downloaded more than 444 million times the world over, making us the No. 1 mobile-first kids brand in the App Store. Our products focus on sparking kids’ creativity and imagination, creating opportunities for open-ended play.

With offices in Stockholm and San Francisco, Toca Boca is owned by Spin Master Corp., a global children’s entertainment company that creates, designs and manufactures a diversified portfolio of innovative toys, games, products and entertainment properties.

headline: Senior Cloud Operations Engineer - DevOps
description.text:
Are you an experienced Cloud Operations and DevOps professional? Do you have experience managing the life cycle of resilient and secure micro service architectures in public cloud environments? Are you a large-scale change agent and advocate of DevOps principles? Join our team in Stockholm as Cloud Operations - Senior Engineer and enjoy a dynamic environment where you can make a difference!  
 
At ASSA ABLOY Global Solutions we are working with Identity and Security Solutions. We reimagine how people move through their world, whether that world is a cruise ship, education facility, hotel or care facility. In the division we have collected brands and business areas as diverse as Hospitality, Marine to Construction and Senior Care but they all have some common traits:
Selling solutions, not locks or access control systems
Direct sales model (B2B)
Software centric products

 
Many of the business areas are in the beginning of their cloud journey and need help in both enabling cloud native product development and establishing platforms to offload the product teams’ cognitive load and give a great developer experience and a reliable product operations.
 
Our small team Cloud Operations is responsible for a couple of Platforms: IAM, SSO, CI/CD incl. SCR, Testing, Compute (AWS looking to onboard Azure), Security and Monitoring and we are looking for more team members to mature and develop them as well as act in an advisory capacity to help the Product teams to develop.
 
What would you do as our Senior Cloud Operations Engineer
We organize ourselves in small cross-functional teams, where you will be working closely with the developers, ensuring automation in application level (unit tests, data tests, and integration tests). You will be the driving force for maintaining and improving the AWS infrastructure, as well as have an advisory role towards the business areas in explaining architecture patterns and system solutions among others.
The tasks can involve anything from configuring load balancers setup AWS security, backup automation, maintaining and developing CI/CD systems that is hosted on AWS and GitLab.
 
You would also:


Help business areas and product teams to onboard their workload to cloud and business agile/DevXOps transformation
You will apply your expertise to build and run scalable and fault tolerant soluton
Automate cloud solution implementation using latest DevXOps CI/CD tools and pipelines
Implement and manage cloud-native solutions

 
In this role you will report directly to the Director Cloud and Product IT Operations at ASSA ABLOY Global Solutions and will be based in Årstadal, Stockholm.
 
The skills and experience you need
We believe you are an experienced cloud engineer familiar with DevOps practices, who loves being part of a team delivering high quality platform and you do this by sharing our belief in the agile values, being motivated, focused, taking initiatives, and being eager to learn.
 
We are looking for someone who:


Has experience with CI/CD, Security, Automation, Scripting, Cloud, Log management, IAM, NW, Kubernetes
Has a background as a Software Engineer with DevOps focus or a System Engineer that have developed Infra-as-Code capabilities with 5+ years of experience - strongly preferred
Speaks fluent Swedish 
Is proactive, works efficiently and has good communication skills 
 

We review applications regularly, so don’t wait
We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. 
 
To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Daria Skucha, our Talent Acquisition Partner, at daria.skucha@assaabloy.com or Anders Hernodh, Director Cloud and Product IT Operations, at anders.hernodh@assaabloy.com .
 
We are the ASSA ABLOY Group
Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 50,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

headline: DevOps Engineer - Senior & Mid-level
description.text:
The Role

We are looking for a passionate DevOps Engineers who wants to take ownership of the infrastructure for our game server technology and help to develop this into our future platform. You will need to be able to work both as part of the team as well as independently. We strive for technical excellence and you will be required to venture outside of your comfort zone, learning, and implementing new technologies. You need to be able to take initiative and find creative solutions to complex problems.

We currently have opportunities for a senior and mid-level candidates and therefore we would like to hear from people at both levels of experience.



Responsibilities

- Build and maintain Docker / Kubernetes / Helm definitions.
- Manage Azure Kubernetes Service infrastructure.
- Create / maintain Azure DevOps based CI/CD pipeline for our upcoming game platform.
- Manage our resources (Clusters, Linux VMs, Databases, etc.) on Azure.
- Make sure our services are running around the clock. (Handle alerts)
- Use existing and new monitoring tools to keep the uptime of our systems.
- Build scripts to automate pipelines and processes.
- Work closely with server and game teams to build and support gaming products.
- Maintain and expand our infrastructure as code and configuration management toolset.






Essential requirements

- 5+ years (senior)/ 2+ years’ experience (mid-level) with Azure cloud environments
- 5+ years (senior)/ 2+ years’ experience (mid-level) with DevOps tools and release engineering
- Familiarity with infrastructure/pipeline as code and best practices
- Understanding/experience with web services, databases and relating infrastructure/architectures
- Scripting skills with PowerShell / Bash
- Understanding of networking concepts both on-premises and in the cloud, i.e. load balancers, Azure Application Gateways, WAF, DNS, subnets/vnets, etc.


What are we using?

- Docker / Kubernetes / Helm
- Azure
- Azure DevOps
- Application Insights
- Azure Table
- PostgreSQL
- Terraform
- Ansible




Good to have

- .NET Core
- Orleans
- SignalR


Personal traits

- Ability to take ownership of responsibilities
- Good interpersonal and team-work skills
- Open to feedback
- Collaborative and consensus-driven approach


About Ringtail Interactive



Ringtail Interactive is fast-growing technology start up working in the games industry with an overall goal of creating an unrivalled server solution to the market for use within small and medium sized enterprises. The team consists of a diverse group of experienced professionals from all around the world consistently pushing the boundaries of what is possible for a small development team. The company consists of two subsidiaries, Ringtail Games and Ringtail Technology.

Over the next year, we will be continuing to build the core of the team. Joining now will give you a chance to have a real impact on the company and the way in which the project develops.

headline: We´re looking for a star in DevOps!
description.text:
If you want to be a Devops superstar – this is the place to be!

Information about the position
As a DevOps engineer at Tietoevry Create, you will be part of the new Tietoevry, which in 2023 has a goal to grow in turnover and staff.

Tietoevry is one of the leading companies in the Nordics building digital services for our clients both in the private and public sectors. Tietoevry Create is looking to expand our DevOps team in Umeå and are now looking for DevOps Engineers to boost their team.

This recruitment process is handled by Professionals Nord and Tietoevry´s wish is that all questions about the service go to info@pn.se

The team
You will be part of a competent team that together has a lot of experience and knowledge. You´ll get an opportunity to participate in many different projects and deliveries where you become part of the delivery team and work together towards different customers.

Tietoevrys DevOps Experts implement solutions for their customers, they are also involved in automation activities and effective usage and migrations to cloud platforms.

Tietoevrys goal is to increase the level of automation and increase speed and quality for their customers by implementing solutions using concepts like CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, Configuration as Code along with utilization of cloud platforms.

Work tasks/job assignments

 • Lead DevOps and Agile transformations for customers
 • Introducing Continuous Integration, Continuous Delivery, Continuous Deployment and Test Automation concepts with the target of building a world-class automatic delivery pipeline
 • Providing automatic setup and efficient usage of cloud-based environments
 • Providing tools, frameworks, and processes that secure the quality of customer application
 • Suggesting optimizations and improvements to reduce lead times time and remove bottlenecks in product development

We are looking for
Candidates who have a drive to build a career in DevOps. Perhaps you have previously been a developer or worked with infrastructure where you encountered DevOps and automation (CI/CD/TA), which gave you the drive and passion to develop into a DevOps expert.

We believe that your personal qualities are crucial to how well you will thrive in the role. You are a self-driven person who are interested in learning and adapting to new technology and trends. For this role you need knowledge of Swedish and English. Furthermore, you have an automation and improvement mindset in all implementation work and are analytic and a problem solver.

START: Immediately
COVERAGE: Full-time
CITY: Umeå or Sundsvall
SELECTION: Ongoing
CONTACT: Emelie

Apply for the position below by filling in your information and attaching documents. You can also log in to "Mina sidor" after you have confirmed your account, here you can create your candidate profile which increases your chance to get your dream job! We review the selection on an ongoing basis and may therefore have proceeded with candidates before the ad is closed. Unfortunately we do not accept applications via email, but if you have questions about the service, you are welcome to contact us at info@professionalsnord.se
